reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content: You need connect with your wear, then download the watchface, after wait for a while, the process take 2 min aprox, when a notifications of installation appears on your wear then tap it, for the firs sync just open the app from your phone.

reply.author: SamSoft
reply.content: Thx Sonja your comment is so important to us, soon more features and customization, stay tuned
